Generated Narrative: SearchParameter observation-patient.family

ObservationPatientFamilyNameSearchParameter

Parameter patient.family:string

Searches for observations based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient.family={familyName}

ResourceObservation
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesObservation
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: ObservationPatientFamilyNameSearchParameter
description: Searches for observations based on the patient's family name eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Observation?patient.family={familyName}
